name: Bug Arena - Fall 2017 - 470
description:
Bug arena is a game of survival in an arena where everyone else is trying to kill you. Either destroy the leaves as the fire ant and make the terrain other players enemies and burn the other bugs till you are the last one standing, or be the beetle who finds fruit to get stronger and can then shoot people with your massive minigun.

          Squash or be squashed in this multiplayer, 3D fps game where you can live out your wonderful fantasy of being… a bug. But more importantly, live out your fantasy of killing other bugs. Be the last to survive in two rounds and you will be considered the queen bee!
